entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Naujaat
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:13 AM CST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 38.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 38. Wind chill minus 55 this morning and minus 49 this afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CST Friday 17 February 2023
